text: 3:10: Mat 24:43; Luk 12:39; 1 Thes 5:2; Chph 16:15 Aniatachu Pumapa Nikhuo chu inru angin juong atih. Ha nikhuoa han chu rahang inringtak le invâna neinunngei kângin inmang a ta, pilchung le asûnga neinunngei murdi khom inmangrip atih.3:10: inmangrip; miziek sekhata chu man nîng atih; Adangngei chu kang let atih; inkhata chu sietminmang nîng atih.3:10: Mat 24:43; Luk 12:39; 1 Thes 5:2; Chph 16:15
